author: Hytale Team
title: Hotfixes: January 2026

author: Hytale Team
title: Hytale Patch Notes - Update 1
bodyExcerpt: Hytale Patch Notes - Update 1Welcome to the first Hytale update! Today, we are releasing new content alongside a range of fixes and quality-of-life improvements. We are committed to maintaining a rapid patching cadence to address issues and improve the game as quickly as possible.World & EnvironmentAdded dinosaurs and other ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Hytale is finally here!
bodyExcerpt: Hytale is finally here!The moment has arrived, Hytale is releasing into Early Access today!When we reacquired Hytale last November and became an independent studio, we promised to launch without any delays, and we are keeping that promise. The game is currently in Early Access in its truest form: unpolished and ...

author: Joe
title: A look at Hytale's Lore and Philosophy
bodyExcerpt: Hi everyone! I'm Joe, holder of the keys to Hytale's lore vault, and I'm going to take a few minutes to talk about our approach to narrative and lore, as well as to try to set or reset some expectations around it.Before we get stuck in, there's one thing I ...

author: Dan & Amber
title: The Future of World Generation
bodyExcerpt: Hello! I'm Dan, the world generation engineer here at Hytale. Today I'll be joined by Amber, one of our designers. We'll be taking you through our world generator today, through the lenses of engineering and design.In this post, we want to discuss where we are right now and where we're ...

author: Xael
title: An Introduction to Making Models for Hytale
bodyExcerpt: Hello, I'm Thomas Frick, and I've been art directing Hytale for the past decade.Today, we are so happy to finally share some tips and tricks to get you started on making models in the Style of Hytale.There is so much to say on the topic! Consider this as an introduction ...

author: Lyall
title: Hytale's 1st FAQ
bodyExcerpt: Hi, I'm Patrick 'Lyall' Derbic, and I'm the Executive Director of Hytale. I'm here today to answer some of the most common questions we've seen online.So without further ado, let's get right into it:Will Hytale be on Steam?No, not initially. We want to spend our time in Early Access working ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Hytale Hardware Requirements
bodyExcerpt: Hytale PC Performance & System RequirementsAs we get closer to launch, many players have asked what kind of hardware Hytale requires. Our goal is clear: make the game broadly accessible while still supporting the scale, simulation, and modability that define Hytale. Remember that we are still working on performance improvements.This ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Hytale Early Access: January 13, 2026
bodyExcerpt: Hytale enters early access on January 13, 2026.Pre-purchase opens December 13, 2025.Two weeks ago, we, the original founders, repurchased Hytale, months after it was cancelled. We revived the project, and we are returning to a four-year-old legacy build that had been abandoned. We are personally committing funding for many years ...

author: Ktar
title: Hytale Creative Mode
bodyExcerpt: Hey everyone! I am Ktar, the Creative Mode engineer on Hytale. I'm excited to show you more about the creative side of Hytale! By swapping to Creative Mode in your world, you can fly around and explore, create, edit, make things explode, and more! We are focused on creating an ...

author: Slikey
title: Hytale Modding Strategy and Status
bodyExcerpt: Hytale Modding Strategy and StatusHello, I am Slikey (Kevin Carstens), the Technical Director of Hytale.I want to give you a clear, honest overview of where Hytale modding stands today, what you can expect in the short term, and where we're taking this in the long run.This is not a polished ...

author: Hytale Team
title: HYTALE IS SAVED!
bodyExcerpt: A new and exciting chapter for Hytale begins today.We are thrilled to announce that we have acquired Hytale from Riot Games. While it didn't make sense for them to continue developing it in its existing form, they ultimately wanted what's best for players, and that's for us to eventually play ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Spring 2025 Development Update

author: Hytale Team
title: Winter 2024 Development Update
bodyExcerpt: Hello! In this end of year development update we'll be discussing the progress we've made in 2024 and looking ahead to our plans for 2025. We'll catch up on this year's milestones, show the visual progress of the new engine, and take a look at the updated state of our ...

author: Hytale Engineering Team

Our space is particularly interesting because it’s the perfect mix of ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Summer 2024 Development Update
bodyExcerpt: Hello! In today’s development update, we’ll be sharing perspectives from the team on the progress we’ve made in the first half of 2024. These include a first glimpse of our in-development new engine and an overview of the way we’re structuring the development of the game from 2025 onwards. We’ll ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Summer 2024 Technical Explainer: Hytale's Entity Component System

author: John Hendricks, Game Director
title: Winter 2023 Development Update
bodyExcerpt: Hello! The team has been making steady progress since our update in the summer. Before we share more, let's recap the last three years of Hytale's development.In the first ...

title: December 2020 Development Update

author: Hytale Team
title: Inside the Hytale foley studio
bodyExcerpt: Foley is the process by which ordinary objects are used to create the sound effects you hear in TV shows, films, and videogames. In this post, we’re going to reveal how Hytale sound designer Kieran Fitzpatrick goes about creating audio for everything from weapon swings to creepy creatures. Consider this ...

We'll take a look at some experimental new rendering techniques, take a deep dive into Hytale's upgraded atmospheric audio system, and ...

author: Hytale Team
title: Hytale graphics update
bodyExcerpt: Hytale is based on a custom engine that has been built from scratch over the last four years. This year, our engine developers have continued to upgrade our technology with new features, including real time shadows, improved water effects and bloom, and a host of improvements to rendering and particle ...

As we publish this, the Hytale announcement trailer has been viewed more than 11 million times - a number that far exceeds our wildest expectations!We can't thank the gaming community enough for all of the amazing support we’ve received ...

author: Hytale Team
title: The Hytale FAQ: December 13th 2018
bodyExcerpt:
We’ve just unleashed a hurricane of information about Hytale, so it’s natural that you might have some questions. Below, you’ll find an extensive FAQ covering many important topics, including an extra FAQ aimed squarely at content creators.
General FAQ

When is Hytale coming out?
